name: Michael
title: Blessings Of God
text: To encourage the teenagers to live their lives in such a way they can receive blessings from God always.

name: Lucia
title: Author Of Blessing
text: All blessing come from God because He is the author of all blessing. God is the author of our fate.

name: Emeka
title: Blessings By Worship
text: We Worship God, He is moved to bless us abundantly without any restrictions of any kind

name: Osasuwi
title: Blessings through Skills
text: God Blesses us through the works of our hands, meaning we need to use our learned skills to work for God.

name: Isaac
title: Blessings through Wisdom
text: God Blesses us through the works of our hands, meaning we need to use our learned skills to work for God.
